/* General styles */ body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #f8f8f8; color: #333; line-height: 1.6; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
/* Header styles */ header { background-color: #222; color: #fff; padding: 10px; text-align: center; }
header h1 { margin: 0; padding: 10px 0; font-size: 24px; }
/* Navigation styles */ nav { background-color: #333; padding: 10px; }
nav ul { list-style-type: none; text-align: center; }
nav ul li { display: inline; margin-right: 10px; }
nav ul li a { color: #fff; text-decoration: none; }
/* Main content styles */ main { padding: 20px; }
/* Footer styles */ footer { background-color: #222; color: #fff; text-align: center; padding: 10px; }
